Uses of Class
entities.Entity

    • Uses of Entity in entities

      Subclasses of Entity in entities 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Character
      Abstract class of all different character types
      class  Consumable
      Entity type that can be consumed by a player, gives perk after being consumed
      class  MeleeWeapon
      The object of a melee weapon.
      class  Monster
      The monster object that can move around the level and attack the player
      class  MovableEntity
      Abstract class for a movable entity
      class  Pickupable
      Abstract class for a pickupable object
      class  Player
      Player object, the entity that is controlled by the user
      class  Projectile
      Projectile object, handles a weapon that fires projectiles in a given direction
      class  StationaryEntity
      Abstract class for an entity that cannot move/be moved
      class  Weapon
      Abstract class for all the different types of weapons
      Methods in entities with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Weapon.attack(Entity victim)
      Deals damage to a given entity
      private int Weapon.getDamage(Entity victim)
      Returns the amount of damage to give a given entity
      private float Weapon.getModifier(Entity victim)
      Gets the modifier depending on the type of the weapon compared to the type of the entity
